website_summaries.verdict: A highly acclaimed, comfort-focused desk chair with superior ratings. The best on the market.
pros: Intuitive comfort features for the spine and body
Keeps you comfortable for extended periods of time
cons: Not everyone likes the feel of the fabric

customer_reviews.title: Beware. These are not "open box" or "customer return" ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware. These are not "open box" or "customer return" chairs. They are refurbished and reconstructed chairs. The fabric is much cheaper than original Steelcase fabric and the parts used to refurbish the chair are not genuine Steelcase parts. Just know that you are getting a sub-standard chair before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Chair is in Worst condition- premium seating is selling fake products!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by chair condition. Armrest is peeling off paint on just touching it. Back is not stiff. Height adjustment does not work smoothly. Have to pull chair up with hands. And chair smells like shoe polish. See photo attached - paint peeling of on just touching armrest.
customer_reviews.author: Kartik

customer_reviews.title: Is this real or a knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: I have the identical chair at work and it is much more comfortable than this one (that I bought for home use). Make me wonder if it is the real thing.The lift does not have the same range and seems to lose air between uses. My butt hurts after only a hour, where I can sit on my office chair all day. The arm rests flop around. I have only had this chair for a few months and only use it 2 days a week. Should not be wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R. Mckeon

customer_reviews.title: Steelcase feels like sitting on steel
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Steelcase Leap refurbished from Madison Seating The quality of the chair is good, and does wonders on my back... but the seat is too hard/thin! I bottom it out, and my tailbone hurts! I have to sit on a pillow for the chair to be comfortable. I'm not sure if I should return the chair, and buy something else, or just buy a gel seat cover or something... I'm pretty thin, and super bony. Other people who have sat on my chair seem to think its comfortable... but it hurts me
customer_reviews.author: Moscato

customer_reviews.title: Scammed for a cheaper chair not shown in image
customer_reviews.text: Note: I bought from the marketplace seller, "Madison Seating Outlet". I never leave 1-star reviews, but many users including myself have been scammed for a cheaper chair. I chose the "black/black" chair, which in the picture, is the exact soft chair that I have at work. What came in the mail is a chair that's so rock hard, there's no way anyone could sit on this all day. What's worse is you cannot just return the chair. For some reason, the return for this product is at the seller's discretion, and I am submitting my 3rd request return in 2 weeks now (it says they'll respond within 48 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! As I started working more from home I noticed that my chair was not very good for sitting for longer times. I already had a leap chair at work for almost 10 years and it is still in great condition. So I ordered another one for home. The one I received is an original new chair not refurbished and it's great. I can sit on it for over 8 hours. I like how it flexes with my upper body movement and gives me support all day. Getting it adjusted takes some time. I am 6'2 and the height adjustment has enough settings to accommodate my height.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: What a difference! !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always had those office store chairs. Hours at the computer. Back hurt, butt hurt, leg hurt. The final straw was always slipping forward in it and ending up on the edge. First decided to get a new cheapo with fabric, but finally decided to go whole hog on a good chair. So glad I did. Total difference the first time I sat down in it. Back and the rest of me feel better and I don't slip forward. If you can afford it, go for it. It's a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good quality chair
customer_reviews.text: The positives: This chair is very comfortable, it rolls easily and appears to be sturdily made. The armrests are adjustable and the seat fits both those who prefer a narrower seat and those who like a roomy seat. The chair has a lot of adjustments which can make it a good ergonomic choice for companies which want to focus on ergonomic safety. The negatives - just one. I am not overly tall, but this seat is a little low for me. With the seat adjusted to the maximum height, it is only 18" from the floor. Anyone with long legs (or bad knees) might prefer that it was a little taller. The chair came already assembled. What a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Hagensick

customer_reviews.title: It's Steelcase, the epitome of design and function.
customer_reviews.text: It meets all expectations on all levels of comfort, and functionality and appears to be very durable. My only complaint is it's too blooming expensive. Nearly twice the price of chairs that are almost as good. However, you eventually reach the age when "almost" just doesn't cut it. I rode a Steelcase at work for many years and it was just as comfortable and durable when I left as when I arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I've had Herman-miller Aeron chairs for a long time and still have one at work. I bought one "refurbed" on here from another seller through Amazon and I'll just say buyer beware. I've yet to get my refund for that one and if it didn't arrive broken it didn't look like you would get years out of it. This chair comes with an amazing warranty, more adjustable than the Aeron, much better arm rests very solid. It breaths well if you are sitting for hours but not quite as good as the full mesh seat obviously. Do yourself a favor and be cautious if you go the refurb route!
customer_reviews.author: James Bean

customer_reviews.title: If you sit all day and are worried about your long-term health, this chair is a solid bet
customer_reviews.text: To my mind, this is about the level of quality you should expect if you're buying a NEW $350 chair. It's much more comfortable and supportive than any $200 or cheaper chair I've owned, but it's not perfect. The armrests are pretty wonky and the back rest leans back much more easily than it comes forward, but it's otherwise a great chair. The lower back/shoulder/wrist pains I sometimes get with cheaper chairs aren't completely gone but they are 95% better. I think you're way overpaying if you buy this chair new for $800 or more, but if you can find a used one in good condition, it'll vastly outperform most others at most price points.
customer_reviews.author: T. White

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but a small quality control problem
customer_reviews.text: I had always used Steelcase ergonomic chairs at work and I love them. Now that most of us are working from home, I just ordered Steelcase Leap chair from Amazon. The chair's comfort is great. But the fabric stitching isn't up to the par. See the attached image. This is definitely a quality control issue. I am going to reach out to Steelcase directly to see if they can help as opposed to shipping this back to Amazon (as I threw away the box).
customer_reviews.author: Anil Kapilavai

customer_reviews.title: Good, but a hard seat
customer_reviews.text: Good chair. Rolls smoothly, arms adjust up and down easily. Comfortable on my 6'2" back. However, if you sit in this chair for very long, and don't have a cushy tushy (mine is bony) then your posterior quarters will become uncomfortable because the seat is a bit too hard for me.
customer_reviews.author: RB601

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Task Chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Steelcase chair is a very high quality office task chair. I started using it immediately after unpacking it. After a couple weeks using it, I find it perfect for my comfort at sitting all day at a desk and working at the computer, on the phone or with documents at my desk. Its many adjustments allow me to fit the chair exactly as my body and arms require for whatever task I'm doing. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Long-Time_Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already Assembled!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in a box in which it was fully assembled... why Amazon thinks it needs to add an extra assembly is beyond me. I would hope that they would be a little quicker at catching these kinds of details...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and good customer support
customer_reviews.text: My chair was a refurbished chair from Madison Seating. The chair itself was in good shape, and the quality seemed good for the price. I had an issue with the fabric, but the company resolved the issue immediately. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: What a difference a good chair makes...
customer_reviews.text: After going through many (inexpensive) chairs and adding back support and other cushions to try to reduce back and leg strain, I finally decided to spend the $ for a quality chair. It is obvious now, even after only a few days of using it, why this chair has received lots of 5 star reviews. Very high quality, plus the ability to adjust every possible height, angle, arm rests, tilt, back support etc (watch the Leap chair video) makes this worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is excellent! I began working at home recently and needed a chair that would offer support for my lower back issues. This chair is comfortable and has helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for long hours at a computer; expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for its high degree of adjustability and its overall comfort, and it does not disappoint. It replaced a desk chair that I spent a lot of time that was causing arm pain when I used a computer mouse for long periods. The pain went away when I switched to the Leap chair and was able to adjust the height and horizontal position of the arm rests. It's a very expensive chair even when discounted, but if you spend long hours at a desk and particularly if your using a. computer for long periods, the adjustability and overall comfort makes it worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Superb chair
customer_reviews.text: My previous company used this chair for those people who had ergonomic problems. I have bought it for my home office and this has been the best investment during work from home conditions of Covid. It came in fully assembled. Had to only take care of the box. For carpet I would recommend using a poly mat. Generally good for lean people.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit M.

customer_reviews.title: ow, my hiney
customer_reviews.text: The hinge connecting the back to the arms juts inward-- if your butt happens to have a bit more than the average amount of 'padding' to it, this hinge will jut into your hips rather painfully. I will say that making a return was reasonably easy-- after describing the problem and sending some photos of the problem, a UPS truck was dispatched to pick up the chair, and my money was refunded promptly.
customer_reviews.author: HardlyFatal

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Is comfortable. Assemble was extremely simple (it was just in two pieces). Updated review after having half a year. The padding in the seat is no longer comfortable I will have to add a pillow. PS: I am 5'11 185 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: Since i started WFH my old chair really caused a ton of back pain. I had to switch it up. Did a ton of research and this chair was the one for me. Not what i wanted to spend but its totally worth it. back pain gone. came assembled. the adjust-ability really makes it a custom chair for you. I also removed the back support that slides up and down the back rest just felt it was to firm. chair is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Harry Wang

customer_reviews.title: hips hurt
customer_reviews.text: the chair is well made, but I am bigger, 235 lbs, and measure 17in from where the arms attach to the seat,and they push into my tender 68 yr old hips painfully, even tho the manufacture claims 19in. Wish the arms could be spread. Some reviews say more comfortable that Aeron. Not true for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gene789

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for the first six months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair about a year ago. Loved it for the first six months, then the fabric on the back rest began to get pulled out. Now, most of the staples on the top of the back rest have been pulled out and the fabric gets pulled down and away from the back rest. A good chair for what I paid for it, but disappointed that I'm likely going to be replacing it sooner than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: but I am pretty extreme in that regard
customer_reviews.text: I have used this chair for several months now and have noticed that I have experienced less back discomfort than previously. I actually wish it had a bit more lumbar curve or padding in that area, but I am pretty extreme in that regard. The chair seems sturdy and I look forward to using it for years to come. It isn't inexpensive, by any means, but it was a small price to pay for less back pain.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mullis

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable chair that solved by back pain
customer_reviews.text: Now that world has changed and many of us are working from home, it's great to have a chair that keeps me comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming or office chair.
customer_reviews.text: Came fully assembled and is great for long periods at the computer. I use this for gaming and it is the best chair I have used so far. Comfortable and easy to use adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 months and coming apart, ALREADY????  Nearly $1000?
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed after 2 months of owning the chair to see that two separate areas of the chair are coming apart. Although I've contacted the manufacturer, I'm not inclined to recommend this despite the fact that it is considerably more comfortable to sit in than my previous office chair was. This chair was and is still available and cost over $900... I have contacted Steelcase to resolve this issue but if it isn't resolved, this review will remain unchanged, and so will my star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Lower back, elbow support for relaxed sitting posture.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for a couple years now, I think, and I must say it's great. The lower back is always supported, as are the elbows. As a result, shoulders are relaxed, and no lower back compression is happening. I am a very picky chair person, as my body just hates sitting, it seems. This chair is fantastic. I use it for a couple hours a day on average. The rest of the time I stand (I have a height adjustable desk).
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Roger

customer_reviews.title: We love our chairs!
customer_reviews.text: We love our chairs! Our work consist of us sitting for most of the day and that can start to effect our back. These chairs have made our office sitting hours so much better. From the minute you sit you notice the difference between a Steelcase Leap Fabric Chair to any other chair. We are the envy of the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Yadira Sotlero

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Back
customer_reviews.text: Virtually no assembly. Excellent back support. Pricey but it has saved me from trips to the chiropractor. As far as I'm concerned, it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful true navy fabric delivered in a timely manner with zero assembly required! I tried to order this on 2 occasions through an online competitor...hopeless, to say the least. Amazon gets it done. Thank you! My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a damaged condition. The shipping box was not damaged suggesting that the damaged product was shipped. It’s not useable so I returned it back. I am never buying this over priced product again.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: I like the chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair, even if it has some minor defects (like one armrest being at a slightly higher level than the other...when set in the same notch). I don't know if that's design or assembly issue. Anyway, it arrived promptly and was well packaged. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Champion
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best computer chair. I had an Aeron, and don't get me wrong they are wonderful --especially in hot climates-- but I like Leap better. I kinda wish I had both to switch off sometimes since it gets hot in my office upstairs during the Tucson summers, but if I had to choose it'd be this.
customer_reviews.author: Shmizz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great home office chair!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, functional and comfortable chair. This chair has a side-actuated gas cylinder to raise and lower the chair, so it must be positioned exactly right. It works smoothly and is adjustable in every position. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Krehmojo

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Working at home I bought a cheap chair last year and my back was killing me. This chair has been great and arrived fully assembled
customer_reviews.author: John Huntington

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE SEAT CUSHION W/ IN A MONTH
customer_reviews.text: CHAIR LOSS ITS CUSHIONING W/IN A MONTH. I LIKE STEELCASE CHAIRS, BUT THIS WAS THE WORST CHAIR I'VE HAD. DISSATISFIED
customer_reviews.author: Tn

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the seller would mention more details about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I suspect the chair I got is refurbished. The upholstery and arms rests feel cheap; no buzz or 3dknit. You get what you pay for... I've had other Steelcase chairs before bought from official resellers and the materials were quite different. It would be nice if the seller would mention more details about the state of the chair and the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good if from the right seller
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers have gotten fake products here but if you do some research behind the sellers you should be able to find a trustworthy one. Thankfully I did because this chair has been a savior from my back over the past six months! I can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rooter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and spend most of my day in this chair. It's quite comfortable and easily adjustable. The only issue I've had was ordering it. I waited weeks for an email letting me know it's been shipped and didn't receive one until I reached out to the seller asking for an update. Once it arrived it was smooth sailing. There was no assembly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used one from Madison Seating at a deep discount -- they said it was in "like new" condition and it is! If I didn't know it was used I would never guess. It is so much more comfortable and sturdy than my old home office chair. I may never be able to work in a cheap office chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: Almost noce enough to make you want to come to the office.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. I have never been so comfortable and at a truly amazing price. Came to me reconditioned in a as good as new condition. The chair is highly adjustable for comfort. It is far better constructed than your typical office chair from Walmart or Staples.
customer_reviews.author: VMI 1982

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable once you get it fit for you
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair used at 1/3 msrp. This is the most customizable chair I've ever owned. Incredibly comfortable once you get it fit for you. However I'm not sure I could justify spending almost a thousand dollars on it. If it's on sale or gently used I highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ch
customer_reviews.text: The chair is perfect. Great lumbar support, can adjust tightness and position. Soft cushion for seat and back. First chair I received the height adjustment didn't work proper but Madison Seating promptly sent a new one. Good customer support. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, good quality and comfortable for our needs at home office.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Welu

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most high end chair I have had and it's great....but...you have to find YOUR settings for it. It'll take a while for you to find the perfect setting but once you do WHOA this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: STAV

customer_reviews.title: Super comfty but the fabric is super itchy on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfty but the fabric is super itchy on my back, definitely try to avoid having skin touch this
customer_reviews.author: jdwyer1017

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice but quality testing is poor.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with my purchase as the chair looked nice and was clean, but the chair I was sent was broken in a way that was not immediately noticeable. Once I started working from home more regularly I noticed that it slowly loses air and sinks downward while you use it. If I had known I could have gotten a broken chair I would have gone for a new one instead. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Minerich

customer_reviews.title: Best exec chair I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best exec chair I have ever owned. I used to be a Steelcase dealer, years ago. I was partial to the 454 Chairs. I have one in my other office. this one is a little over the top with adjustments. But well worth the effort. I have not back trouble while in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C. Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable for the price. The earlier version had more cushion with better support.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Summers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective chair, which the Back Store replaced. The new chair is the best, by far, I've ever sat in.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, small cosmetic scratches and scuffs
customer_reviews.text: Chair came a week early, and had all the parts. Works fine, small cosmetic scratches and scuffs, cushion like new. So far so good 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Chin

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product backed by a solid company
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent work / office chair. It provides a very nice balance between form and function, and at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hulsemann

customer_reviews.title: It was advertised as in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a "lightly used" Leap chair. It was advertised as in like new condition, and it was. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was easy to assemble and my wife is very happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: chair was a birthday gift for my wife, who has had a Aeron for several years that finally gave up the ghost.The chair arrived on time, was easy to assemble and my wife is very happy with the chair, likes it better than the Aeron.
customer_reviews.author: Grayman

customer_reviews.title: It seems so perfect that I have no need to think the grass ...
customer_reviews.text: Solved my back problems while also allowing me the comfort of a marvelously ergodynamic chair. It seems so perfect that I have no need to think the grass might be greener elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Taarna

customer_reviews.title: Back Problems Solved
customer_reviews.text: We have had this chair for about 3 months and my wife is thrilled. She logs a lot of hours at her desk (she owns the company), which made the chiropractor happy, but this chair eliminated the visits. I happen to use the AllSteel #19, for the same reasons and would say it is easily on par with that chair. Delivery was excellent, priced right, and would recommend this chair for any serious workaholic.
customer_reviews.author: Drn66

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Back support is fantastic and seat is comfortable. Arms have easy adjustments - frame and legs strong and balanced.
customer_reviews.author: SilverRanger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair
customer_reviews.text: An incredibly comfortable and adjustable chair. The chair is pre assembled, just attach base. The online video for proper adjustment is great.
customer_reviews.author: FJG

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair...
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair, but for people like me who don't have much padding the rear, kind of wish it had a gel seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to go through all the adjustments and easily the most comfortable chair I've ever sat in. I recommend this  video to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: THE best chair ever
customer_reviews.text: THE best chair ever. Have purchased various chairs over the years for my business, this one is a consistent favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: The best chair I ever seat in
customer_reviews.text: The best chair I ever seat in!! Good support on the lower back. Was thinking to get Miller Aeron but glad I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: Bible Believers Of Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great chair with all the features I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great chair with all the features I wanted. Tip: Inspect carefully upon receipt, the first one had all the plastic broken off the bottle of the seat in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: All Day Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfy enough to sit in for 8 hours a day. Had a Hermon Miller Aeron in the past that I loved. They're very different from each other and I'm not sure which I like better, but both have really helped with sore backs.
customer_reviews.author: phloopy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice chair, but the pneumatic cylinder that raises and lowers the chair doesn't seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this chair is completely adjustable - and easy to adjust ... custom for each individual
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: ... used this chair for years at my office and love it! I finally bought one for my home ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this chair for years at my office and love it! I finally bought one for my home office. I couldn't be happier! The chair came quickly, fully assembled and in great shape. The price was much better than Steelcase retail...so that was great too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Little high in price
customer_reviews.text: Took care of the back problem. Very comfortable. Little high in price.
customer_reviews.author: Darts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT Chair in every way - did a lot of research - found a great $$ deal on this one. Very good chair
customer_reviews.author: John Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Saved my back! Fantastic chair, and well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Better than expected!!! Must have for anyone with back issues!
customer_reviews.author: Holly D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great, too expensive, and durability remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.text: Not as fantastic as I had hoped, too expensive, but a hell of a lot better than my old office depot special. It did take a little adjusting and getting used to before my back stopped complaining. I suggest you sit on it before you buy it. And sit for a couple of hours if possible because my back started to complain only after a couple of hours. Now that my back has gotten used to it, it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: KTS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and adjust. Best chair I ever sat in! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easily moved about at my computer work station. I highly recommend it to anyone concerned with effects on their posture from sitting in front of their computer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah's Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this chair. I sit in front of a desktop computer for more hours than is believable. I get up at the end of the day without backaches. Can't think of any negatives.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair, easy to adjust and very supportive. My back is doing much better! Some people criticize it for looking plain but its a wolf in sheep's clothing.
customer_reviews.author: William Mark

customer_reviews.title: Like Sitting On A Feather!!!
customer_reviews.text: They had it advertised as used, I can tell by looking at it that it was never used.. I only paid $228 for mine. I see new Leap chairs list for close to a $1000. This chair is so comfortable and very well made. I love it. American Made also.
customer_reviews.author: steve k felton

customer_reviews.title: a perfectly adjustable chair
customer_reviews.text: this is just a great chair. the seat adjusts to the right depth as well as height. the arm wrests adjust. the lumber support adjusts to the perfect spot. the firmness and amount of back leaning support is great. Over-all this is well worth its cost for some serious sitting in comfort
customer_reviews.author: jimboS

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for our home office
customer_reviews.text: We have been very pleased with the new office chair. We like the quality and it is a nice size for the area we have. Would recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful chair. Very comfortable for sitting at my desk all day. Highly recommend! Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: High Quality chair was best investment
customer_reviews.text: I am so much more productive now with this chair. I can work pain free for hours straight using the Leap Chair.
customer_reviews.author: steven f

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is exactly what I was looking for!! The lumbar support helps my husband sit tall, no leaning. The chair can be adjusted for my height, I am 4'9".....as well as my husband who is 5'10. That is huge for us!! A very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Holdt

customer_reviews.title: for big guys
customer_reviews.text: Fits my husband well and is sturdy. I think this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you want a lookalike of the real deal .
customer_reviews.text: The material used for the chair is not what is shown in the pictures . Not as comfortable as the one it was supposed to have come with . The pad where you place your hands has already kinda worn off in less than 2 months . With these two issues I would have normally returned the chair back but the return policy is complicated with pages and pages of notes that any attempt to return the chair will only end up costing you more than what it costs to buy .
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever.
customer_reviews.text: Really, it is the best chair I have ever sat upon.
customer_reviews.author: KTS

customer_reviews.title: Leap Chair V2
customer_reviews.text: The lift does not work and I have to pay for shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Thousand dollar plastic.... worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing spine hugging plastic back research based super chair. Never thought it would live up to the hype.... but it did. Most comfortable working chair out there ! ( Not for Overweight or Big Pear Shaped folks )
customer_reviews.author: Facility Manager

customer_reviews.title: After These Messages...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my chair around Xmas and it was backordered. Bah humbug! When it finally arrived I was surprised to see that it was in a HUGE box and that in this HUGE box was a fully assembled chair which made me VERY happy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Smith

customer_reviews.title: One of the best and most widely used chairs by corporate America
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most widely chairs used by corporate America. Expensive but worth it for our staff. Why by the $100 office depot chairs every 18 months - buy quality for your people
customer_reviews.author: Florida Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best chair yet.
customer_reviews.text: Entirely satisfied. This is the best chair I've used in the 30+ years I've been in an office environment. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is for a business and my work is too busy for me to take the time to return so i am accepting as is but disappointed. Packa
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with cosmetic damage. Otherwise high quality. This is for a business and my work is too busy for me to take the time to return so i am accepting as is but disappointed. Packaging was not damaged so this must have left the factory like this.
customer_reviews.author: n/a

customer_reviews.title: Do n0t like
customer_reviews.text: The back is not stationery and I am disabled and do not have enough muscle power to keeo it steady.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Back
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair worth the price. I have had a lot of problems with chairs due to a lower back inquiry I suffered several years ago. If I sit for any length of time my lower back muscles will tighten up. With this chair I can sit in it all day with out any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Garrie V Hankins

product_meta.title: Steelcase Leap Fabric Chair, Black, -
product_meta.description:
Color:Black/BlackLeap is a highly ergonomic chair that adjusts to fit your body, so you don’t have to adjust your body to fit the chair. Thanks to its LiveBack technology, the Leap chair back changes shape to mimic and support the movement of your spine. And with its simple and intuitive adjustments, it’s easy to adjust your Leap chair to fit you comfortably for the entire day. Steelcase Leap chair complete features are pneumatic seat-height adjustment, variable back stop, height-width-pivot-depth adjustable arms, black plastic frame, shell, base, arms, adjustable lumbar support, hard casters, fabric, open box refurb.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The streamlined, stylish contour of the Steelcase Leap chair is just the beginning. The Leap is the first chair that actually changes shape to support your movements! With its Live Back technology, it moves dynamically as your back moves, mimicking the movement of your spine; the arms of the chair move in and out, forward and back; the seat glides forward so you can recline without leaving your vision and reach zone, and stay oriented to your work. Even when leaning forward, the seat edge flexes to relieve pressure on the back of the legs. In short, the Leap chair's ergonomic advances allow you to work comfortably, and more productively, in a proven healthy manner for extended periods of time.
feature_bullets: Steelcase's no.1 selling ergonomic chair. livelumbar technology flexes with movements for ergonomic comfort.
Item Dimensions: 24.75" L x 27" W x 43.5" H
Liveback - mimics the natural spine shape throughout the workday. the leap chair's back changes its shape to conform to yours so you can work comfortably and stay comfortable longer.

Natural glide system. recline and the seat glides forward enabiling you to recline and still stay visually oriented and reach your work. this encourages more varied postures, which means less static load on the spine.
Cradle to Cradle Certification - Silver. Leap is up 98-percent recyclable by weight, depending on the options selected, and made of up to 30-percent recycled content.
Scs indoor advantage certified. helps identify low-emitting products
LiveBack - changes shape to mimic and support the movement of the spine
Natural Glide System enables you to comfortably recline without straining your eyes, arms and neck
SCS Indoor Advantage certified Identifying Leap as a low-emitting
Cradle to Cradle(CM) certified Leap is up to 94 percent recyclable by weight, depending on the options selected, and made of up to 30-percent recycled content
